block.l: Would you like to go first (X) or second (O)? Please enter 1 or 2.
It's your turn! Click in an open square.
You can't move there please try again.

custom-block.comment: You are responsible for this block.

block.l: Great job you beat the computer!

block.comment: If the center is empty, take the center

scripts.comment: Algorithm: 0. Always prioritize the center 1. If there are two opponent symbols in a row, block it first, but if there are two friendly symbols and none opponent symbols, win it first. 2. If the above doesn't exist, then choose any rows that opponent have not placed anything yet 3. If none of these conditions exist, then return false so a random move will be chosen
